knimeNode.name: Category2Number (Apply)
knimeNode.shortDescription: Maps each category of a column with nominal data to an integer.

intro.p: This node takes columns with nominal data and maps every category to an integer. The information for the value mapping is taken from the PMML model.
This node is typically used to apply the same mapping found by a Category2Number node.

fullDescription.option: If checked, the computed columns will be appended to the input table. Otherwise the computed columns replace their source columns.
The column name of the computed columns are the name of the column in the input appended by this suffix.

ports.outPort: Pass-through of the incoming PMML document
